error.message: Call to deprecated function format_string(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Render\FormattableMarkup instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to image_srcset_formatter.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
